role.argrole: entity arg0 gives the highest possible estimate

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 瞧) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 那样)) (VP (VV 满打满算)))))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 不过)) (VP (QP-PRD (QP (CD 七) (CLP (-NONE- *RNR*-2))) (PU 、) (QP (CD 八) (CLP-2 (M 岁)))))))
